mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Book (Book_ID, BOOKNAME, PRICE, PUBLISHER, PUB_DATE, AUTHOR, GRADE_AVG, BOOK_CNT, ORDER_CNT, DETAILS, BOOK_IMAGE, CATEGORY) VALUES (BOOKID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bookName}, #{price}, #{publisher}, #{pubDate}, #{author}, #{gradeAvg}, #{bookCnt}, #{orderCnt}, #{details}, #{bookImage}, #{category})
